Dear Hagop, dear Mr. Nasr,

 

Please find attached the planning of the works which will be done by our landlord in our Christofle Boutique located at 9 rue Royale 75008 Paris (from February 2025 to the end of September 2025).

Due to these works:

metadata.doc_id: CRR9YL4 - boutique royale works by the landlord\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Please find attached the planning of the works which will be done by our landlord in our Christofle Boutique located at 9 rue Royale 75008 Paris (from February 2025 to the end of September 2025).

Due to these works:

*	there will be movements of Christofle products between our Boutique and an external warehouse near our Boutique managed by the company TopChrono (address of this external warehouse: 10 rue du Colisée 75008 Paris, warehouse under alarm + video surveillance / individualized location dedidated to Christofle products of 300m²). It is our responsibility to ensure these movements (transport and storage). Please find attached the detailed quotation signed by our landlord.
*	there will be movements of Christofle furniture managed by the company BIDET. Please find attached the detailed quotation signed by our landlord.

Please inform our insurers.

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> : please note the 3 first movements of Christofle products below from our Boutique to the external warehouse. @Jonathan Noel <mailto:jon.noel@christofle.com>  @Nicolas Vannelle <mailto:n.vannelle@christofle.com> : please provide the value of the transferred stock by movement. 

*	Mercredi 5 février matin --> transfert des produits sans-valeur 
*	Mercredi 5 février après-midi --> transfert des produits avec valeur partie 1 sur 2 
*	Jeudi 6 février toute la journée --> transfert des produits avec valeur partie 2 sur 2 

 

Please confirm by return.

Best regards, 

 

Pauline BATTINI

Responsable  Juridique Groupe

Group Legal Manager

Objet : Boutique Royale / Works by the landlord
Importance : Haute

 

Dear Hagop, dear Mr. Nasr,

Due to these works:

metadata.doc_id: CRR9YL4 - boutique royale works by the landlord\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Please find attached the planning of the works which will be done by our landlord in our Christofle Boutique located at 9 rue Royale 75008 Paris (from February 2025 to the end of September 2025).

Due to these works:

*	there will be movements of Christofle products between our Boutique and an external warehouse near our Boutique managed by the company TopChrono (address of this external warehouse: 10 rue du Colisée 75008 Paris, warehouse under alarm + video surveillance / individualized location dedidated to Christofle products of 300m²). It is our responsibility to ensure these movements (transport and storage). Please find attached the detailed quotation signed by our landlord.
*	there will be movements of Christofle furniture managed by the company BIDET. Please find attached the detailed quotation signed by our landlord.

Please inform our insurers.

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> : please note the 3 first movements of Christofle products below from our Boutique to the external warehouse. @Jonathan Noel <mailto:jon.noel@christofle.com>  @Nicolas Vannelle <mailto:n.vannelle@christofle.com> : please provide the value of the transferred stock by movement. 

*	Mercredi 5 février matin --> transfert des produits sans-valeur 
*	Mercredi 5 février après-midi --> transfert des produits avec valeur partie 1 sur 2 
*	Jeudi 6 février toute la journée --> transfert des produits avec valeur partie 2 sur 2 

 

Please confirm by return.

Best regards, 

 

Pauline BATTINI

Responsable  Juridique Groupe

Group Legal Manager
